title: Instant Repair Failure
body:
So i've haven't played League in a long time so i thought that i should return to it.

I installed the game and was waiting for the patching to start only to get "there was a problem updating league of legends we'll restore a backup version of league" as an error. After that i tried to start the game again as admin and such and now it just says repairing and instantly fails.

I've tried to restart my pc, i've flushed dns and i've removed rads stuff. Nothing seems to work

I would love some help.

replies.body: If you keep getting stuck in a repatch loop, try updating your admin settings really quickly by following the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). The client might not have the admin rights it needs anymore, so try that and let me know if it helps or not.
